cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一位心碎的退休老人据信在他妻子去世六天后，从他们曾经一起散步的“特别的地方”跳下桥自杀。86岁的约翰·洛德在他心爱的妻子朱恩去世后不到一周的4月6日从家中失踪。他的家人在发现一张留言后担心最坏的情况，留言中描述了他多么想念他们63年的婚姻，以及他无法没有她而活。诺丁汉郡警方发起呼吁，希望能找到这位三个孙子的祖父，他在4月6日从他位于诺丁汉圣安斯的家中失踪。今天，警方证实，4月15日由专门的水下搜索小组从特伦特河中发现的一具尸体就是这位失踪的退休老人。他的家人认为他可能在这个风景如画的美景点自杀，这对恩爱夫妻经常一起去散步。洛德先生的女儿艾莉森说，她的父亲正在悲痛中，留下了一张令人心碎的留言，签名为“爱给所有人”，并描述了他无法没有妻子而活。洛德先生最后一次被发现是在4月6日凌晨3点15分左右，当时他把他的白色丰田雅力士汽车停在特伦特河附近。监控录像显示，这位退休老人走向一座桥，这是他最后一次被发现。他的女儿艾莉森说，在他去世之前，这位教学助理住在诺丁汉布尔韦尔，补充说：“他留下了一张纸条。它说他不能没有朱恩而活，他道歉并说“爱给所有人”。他在半夜起来开车完全不符合他的性格。”洛德夫妇是当地教堂的成员，他们“形影不离”，妻子的去世让整个家庭都感到心碎。诺丁汉郡警方发言人说：“在2015年4月15日发现的一名男子的尸体已被确认为失踪的约翰·洛德。86岁的洛德先生于4月6日星期一从他位于圣安斯的家中失踪。”他的尸体于4月15日上午11点左右被诺丁汉郡警方的水下搜索小组发现。“诺丁汉郡警方感谢所有通过分享我们的呼吁来帮助寻找洛德先生的人。”洛德先生的家人将继续得到支持，并要求尊重他们的隐私。“诺丁汉郡警方在这个艰难的时刻与家人同在。”朱恩在3月31日不幸去世，八小时后突然倒下，诺丁汉女王医学中心的医生称这是一次“灾难性的脑出血”。如果您在英国需要关于自杀问题的保密支持，请拨打08457 90 90 90联系萨马利亚人，访问当地的萨马利亚人分部或点击这里。

cnndm.src: six soldiers have finally been put to rest in a cemetery - more than 100 years after they were killed in the first months of world war one . the soldiers were given a burial with full military honours in an emotional ceremony which included the hymn jerusalem in flanders fields , belgium , this morning . little has been discovered about the soldiers , as no relatives have been found , and their graves will be labelled as ‘ known unto god ’ - a description on headstones of all unknown soldiers , which was chosen by author rudyard kipling . honoured : soldiers carry the casket of a british world war i soldier during a reburial ceremony at prowse point cemetery in belgium . ' known unto god ' : the identities of the six soldiers - who were found buried in a farmer 's field nearby - are unknown . uniforms : while their names will remain unknown , four of the six soldiers regiments were identified thanks to their uniforms . ceremony : soldiers fold the flag on the casket of a british soldier , who was killed in october 1914 in belgium . however , their uniforms gave a little hint at who the men had been in life : two served with the king ’s own lancaster regiment and two with the lancashire fusiliers - which both sent soldiers to attend this morning 's service . the bodies of the six soldiers were discovered in a farmer 's field in comines - warneton , near le touquet in belgium , in 2008 and 2010 . it is thought they had been given a field burial after they were killed in october 1914 , near the city of ypres . the area was one of the key battlegrounds at the start of the war , due to its position on belgium 's north coast , and would continue to be so throughout the four year conflict . the first battle of ypres , however , raged from october 19 to november 22 , leaving 7,960 british soldiers dead , 29,562 wounded , and 17,873 missing , according to militaryhistory.com . the soldiers were laid to rest in prowse point military cemetery , which was used from november 1914 to april 1918 , and has the graves of 225 commonwealth soldiers from the first world war . respect : soldiers carry the hats of the pallbearers during a reburial ceremony in prowse point cemetery , south of ypres . history : the cemetery started being used in november 1914 , and now has more than 200 graves of commonwealth soldiers . reburied : it is thought the soldiers were given a field burial during the first chaotic months of the war . thousands : there are around 187,000 graves from the first world war that bear the ‘ known unto god ’ inscription . the bodies of about 60 soldiers of all nationalities are found each year , buried across europe , and there are around 187,000 graves from the first world war that bear the ‘ known unto god ’ inscription . a year ago , 20 soldiers were buried after they were discovered as building work began to construct a prison where the battle of loos took place in september 1915 . on that occasion , one of the soldiers was able to be indentified : private william mcaleer , from the 7th battalion the royal scottish fusiliers . final salute : former soldiers pay their respects at prowse point cemetery on thursday , april 16 . music : british drum major paul ingleton plays the last post during the reburial service , which took place at 10 am . reflections : soldiers travelled from the uk to ensure the men got the final farewell they deserved .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 在2008年和2010年，比利时(Belgium)佛兰德斯(Flanders)战场上发现了六名士兵的尸体，他们被埋在一名比利时农民的田地里。然而，对这些士兵的身份进行的努力一直没有成功，因此他们的墓碑上将标注“只有上帝知道”。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 六名士兵在一战开始的前几个月被杀后，终于在100多年后被安葬在一座墓地上。这些士兵在今天上午在比利时弗兰德斯菲尔德的一场感人的仪式中获得了完整的军事荣誉，其中包括《耶路撒冷》和《弗兰德斯菲尔德》两首赞美诗。这些士兵的身份一直未知，因为没有找到亲属，他们的墓碑将被标记为“上帝所知”——这是作家鲁德亚德·吉卜林选择的所有未知士兵墓碑上的描述。这些士兵的遗体是在2008年和2010年发现在比利时勒图凯附近的一片农田中的。据推测，他们在1914年10月在伊珀尔附近被杀后被埋葬在这里。这个地区是战争开始时的关键战场之一，由于它位于比利时北部海岸，整个四年的战争都会继续如此。然而，第一次伊珀尔战役从1914年10月19日持续到11月22日，造成7,960名英国士兵死亡，29,562人受伤，17,873人失踪。这些士兵被安葬在普罗斯波因特军事公墓，该公墓从1914年11月到1918年4月使用，有225名一战期间的英联邦士兵的墓碑。每年大约有60名来自欧洲各国的士兵的遗体被发现，被埋葬在约18.7万个带有“上帝所知”铭文的一战墓碑上。一年前，当建造一座监狱的工程开始时，20名士兵被发现后被安葬，这是在1915年9月的卢斯战役发生的地方。在那次仪式上，有一名士兵被确认身份：来自第七营皇家苏格兰轻步兵的士兵威廉·麦克利尔。前士兵们在4月16日星期四前往普罗斯波因特公墓向这些士兵致敬，确保他们得到应有的最后告别。英国鼓手长保罗·英格尔顿在上午10点举行的安葬仪式上演奏《最后的哨声》。

cnndm.src: the official advert for floyd mayweather vs manny pacquiao has been released with less than a month until the two meet in las vegas . the marketing team for both mayweather and pacquiao put together the 30 - second clip , filmed in a los angeles studio on march 11 , to advertise the pay - per - view event . it shows both fighters walking towards each other and squaring up in the middle of a desert road , with the mgm grand and ' welcome to fabulous las vegas ' sign visible in the background . the official advert for floyd mayweather ( left ) vs manny pacquiao on pay per view has been released . both fighters walk towards each other and square up in the middle of a desert road in the advert . the marketing team for both mayweather and pacquiao ( pictured ) put together the 30 - second clip . ' it 's time . two legends . one destiny . all roads end here , ' the commentary says as anticipation builds ahead of the $ 300million ( £ 200m ) bout . the fight on may 2 is expected to break the pay - per - view record of £ 102m set by mayweather 's fight with saul ' canelo ' alvarez in september 2013 . it is also expected to surpass the 2.5 million buys that mayweather 's fight with oscar de la hoya accumulated in may 2007 . pay - per - view watchers in america will have to pay up to $ 100 ( £ 67.48 ) to watch the fight . those in the uk , however , will pay less . sky won the bidding war to screen the fight on british shores , and customers will be charged £ 19.95 for access . ' it 's time . two legends . one destiny . all roads end here , ' the commentary says during the official advert . sky won the bidding war to screen the fight and customers will be charged £ 19.95 for access . the fight is expected to break the pay - per - view record of £ 102m set by mayweather vs saul ' canelo ' alvarez . mayweather and pacquiao go head to head at the mgm grand in las vegas in less than a month .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 弗洛伊德·梅威瑟(Floyd Mayweather)和曼尼·帕奎奥(Manny Pacquiao)这两位拳手之间的对决将于5月2日在拉斯维加斯(Las Vegas)米高梅大酒店(MGM Grand)举行。这场比赛的官方广告已经发布，预计这场比赛将打破 2013 年 9 月梅威瑟与索尔“卡内洛”阿尔瓦雷斯创下的 1.02 亿美元的单场付费纪录。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 在距离两位拳击传奇人物梅威瑟和帕奎奥在拉斯维加斯交手不到一个月的时间里，官方广告已经发布。这段30秒的广告是在3月11日在洛杉矶的一个工作室拍摄的，旨在宣传这场付费视图比赛。广告中，两位拳手在沙漠公路上相向而行，站在一起，背景中可见MGM大酒店和“欢迎来到绝妙的拉斯维加斯”标志。广告中的解说声说道：“是时候了。两位传奇人物。一个命运。所有的道路都将在这里终结。”这场比赛预计将打破梅威瑟2013年9月与索尔·卡内洛·阿尔瓦雷斯的比赛创下的1亿英镑的付费视图记录。同时，它也有望超过梅威瑟2007年5月与奥斯卡·德拉霍亚的比赛累计的250万次购买量。美国的付费视图观众将不得不支付高达100美元（67.48英镑）的费用观看这场比赛。然而，英国的观众将支付更少的费用。天空电视台赢得了在英国播放这场比赛的竞标，客户将被收取19.95英镑的费用。在官方广告中，解说声再次说道：“是时候了。两位传奇人物。一个命运。所有的道路都将在这里终结。”梅威瑟和帕奎奥将在不到一个月的时间里在拉斯维加斯的MGM大酒店交手。

cnndm.src: police are investigating the theft of about $ 70,000 worth of bull semen from a farm in southern minnesota . mower county sheriff terese amazi said farmer daniel weness , of leroy , reported on tuesday that a storage canister with vials of bull semen was taken from his unlocked barn . the canister was worth about $ 500 , and the vials of semen were worth from $ 300 to $ 1,500 apiece . scroll down for video . about $ 70,000 worth of bull semen was stolen from a farm in southern minnesota sometime between april 1 and april 7 . the semen , stolen from daniel weness 's farm ( pictured ) was taken from an unlocked barn . a $ 500 canister held vials of semen worth between $ 300 and $ 1,500 each . the theft happened sometime between april 1 and 7 . the man said the only time he and his hired hand were away from the farm was on easter sunday , according to the austin daily herald . police have no suspects . chief deputy mark may said that there is a market for bull semen because it helps farmers on transportation costs of putting a bull and a cow in the same pen to breed . ' a lot of people purchase bid on it or purchase it instead of transporting their animals to and from a site , ' he said . ' they can just purchase a vial of bull semen and inseminate their cow and i guess it 's just more reliable that way . ' mark may , chief deputy of the mower county sheriff 's office said that there is a market for bull semen because it helps farmers reduce transportation costs of animals . frozen semen can live for many years , often outliving the bull it originally came from , according to the washington post . ' a lot of farmers these days use artificial insemination to increase genetic diversity within their herds , ' linnay yarger , an agriculture teacher at austin high school told kaal . ' the range in value depends on the bull it comes from , ' she added . ' some genetic qualities are more highly sought after than others , so the higher priced semen is coming from maybe an award winning bull or a quality that is sought after . ' welness said he has about 80 animals on his farm .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 周二，明尼苏达州南部农场的公牛精液储罐被盗，价值约70,000美元。这起盗窃案发生在4月1日至7日之间。警方仍在调查这起盗窃案。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 警方正在调查明尼苏达州南部一农场约7万美元的公牛精液被盗案件。农场主丹尼尔·韦内斯报告称，他的一个存储罐和价值每支300至1500美元的公牛精液被从未上锁的谷仓中偷走。这起盗窃案发生在4月1日至7日之间，警方目前没有嫌疑人。警长马克·梅表示，公牛精液有市场需求，因为它可以帮助农民节省运输成本，而不必把公牛和母牛放在同一个围栏里交配。冻结的精液可以存活多年，通常比它原来来自的公牛更长寿。农业教师林纳伊·亚格表示，现在很多农民都使用人工授精来增加牲畜的遗传多样性。公牛精液的价值取决于它来自哪头公牛，一些遗传特征比其他的更受追捧，因此价格更高的精液可能来自获奖的公牛或者受到追捧的品质。韦内斯称，他的农场有大约80头动物。

cnndm.src: the father of jules bianchi , the formula one driver who sustained a severe head injury when he crashed into a recovery vehicle at the japanese grand prix in october 2014 , has spoken about his son 's condition . philippe bianchi explained to nice - matin , a newspaper in france , that the marussia driver is still in a coma but is ' fighting fiercely ' and his condition is stable . ' every day , jules is running a marathon . all of his organs are working without assistance . but , for now , he remains unconscious , ' philippe bianchi said . ' he 's moving forward . so we hope for a new evolution . the next one would be for him to get out of his coma . jules bianchi , 25 , remains in a coma after a crash at the japanese grand prix in october 2014 . philippe bianchi ( right ) has spoken of the pain his family have felt every day since the accident . bianchi sustained a severe head injury upon crashing into a recovery vehicle in japan . ' the only thing we can say is that he 's fiercely fighting as he always did , before and after the accident . from a medical point of view , his condition is stable . ' the 25 - year - old bianchi is now in nice , under the watch of neurosurgeons . his father also opened up on the anguish he and his family have gone through since the accident , over six months ago . bianchi receives urgent medical treatment upon crashing at the suzuka circuit on october 5 . the marussia team pay tribute to bianchi at russian grand prix , the week after his accident . ' our universe collapsed on 5 october 2014 , ' bianchi said . ‘ i think that in this type of accident it shocks more than an actual death . the pain is endless - a daily torture . '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 一级方程式赛车手朱尔斯·比安奇(Jules Bianchi)在2014年10月日本大奖赛的一场车祸中头部严重受伤。他的父亲表示，他仍处于昏迷状态，但情况稳定，正在接受积极治疗。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 法国《尼斯晨报》报道，法国一级方程式赛车手朱尔斯·比安奇在2014年10月日本大奖赛中撞上一辆救援车，导致严重头部受伤。比安奇的父亲菲利普·比安奇表示，他的儿子仍处于昏迷状态，但是他正在“顽强地战斗”，目前病情稳定。比安奇的父亲还透露，比安奇每天都在“跑马拉松”，所有器官都在正常运作，但是他仍然没有苏醒。比安奇现年25岁，自从事故发生以来，他一直处于昏迷状态。他的父亲也谈到了自己和家人自事故发生以来的痛苦。比安奇目前在尼斯接受神经外科医生的监护。他的父亲还表示，这种事故比真正的死亡更令人震惊，痛苦是无穷无尽的，每天都是一种折磨。

cnndm.src: city officials are trying to determine what caused bricks to fall nine stories from the facade of a vacant building in downtown cleveland , crushing a minivan that was parked below . cleveland fire officials say bricks along the top of the former national city bank building collapsed and showered down onto the street and sidewalk just after 4 p.m. monday but no one was injured . cleanup of the area was underway on tuesday . scroll down for video . crushed : bricks fell from the top of a building in cleveland on monday afternoon crushing a car below . freak accident : cleveland fire spokesman larry gray told local media the falling bricks might have been a ' freak accident ' and said that the building was not under construction . officials said the area would remain closed as crews cleaned up and investigators determined if other bricks from the building could fall . the building and minivan were unoccupied at the time of the collapse , and no injuries were reported . cleveland fire spokesman larry gray told local media the falling bricks might have been a ' freak accident . ' cleveland fire department spokesman larry gray said that no construction or renovations were being done on the building at the time of the accident , reports cleveland.com . ' i could n't even comprehend what was happening . i just heard bam ! it was like the largest explosion i ever heard , ' said witness andre dimarco who delivers food in the area . drivers and pedestrians are encouraged to avoid the area , police said . the driver of the car has not been identified . look down below ! : bricks fell from the top of this building on monday afternoon and officials are trying to find out why and how the accident occurred . shattered : luckily no one was injured during the accident but this minivan below the building was destroyed . bam ! : witness andre dimarco said the bricks falling sounded like ' the loudest explosion he 's ever heard '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 下午4点周一，前国家城市银行大楼顶部的砖块倒塌并倒在街道和人行道上。没有人受伤，但一辆小型货车被压在下面。克利夫兰消防发言人拉里·格雷(Larry Gray)表示，事故发生的原因很奇怪，目前正在调查中。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 克利夫兰市官员正在努力确定是什么原因导致一座空置建筑物的砖块从九层高处掉落，压碎了停在下面的一辆小货车。克利夫兰消防官员表示，周一下午4点左右，前国家城市银行大楼顶部的砖块坍塌，落在街道和人行道上，但没有人受伤。周二，清理工作正在进行中。消防发言人拉里·格雷告诉当地媒体，掉落的砖块可能是一起“意外事件”，并表示该建筑物并未在施工中。官员们表示，该地区将保持关闭状态，直到清理人员完成工作并确定建筑物是否还有其他砖块可能会掉落。事故发生时，建筑物和小货车都没有人员。克利夫兰消防发言人拉里·格雷告诉当地媒体，事故发生时该建筑物并未在进行施工或翻新。目击者安德烈·迪马科说：“我甚至无法理解发生了什么。我只听到轰隆一声！就像我听过的最大的爆炸声。”警方呼吁驾驶员和行人避开该地区。车辆驾驶员尚未被确认身份。幸运的是，事故中没有人受伤，但建筑物下面的这辆小货车被摧毁。目击者安德烈·迪马科说，掉落的砖块听起来像是“他听过的最大的爆炸声”。

cnndm.src: the family of a bristol woman killed on holiday in france by a parasite - ridden historic tree has been paid £ 86,000 in compensation . carolyn thorpe , 62 , was enjoying a cup of coffee outside a cafe in hiers - brouage , a seaside town in south - west france , when the 20 - foot tree toppled and crushed her to death in 2007 . her daughter sarah wright was also injured by the american ash tree , which was planted 200 years ago to mark the birth of napoleon i 's first son . carolyn thorpe was sat in a pavement cafe when the huge tree fell onto her and her daughter . ms thorpe , age 62 , was killed and her daughter sarah wright was injured . the family have now received around £ 86,000 . the 200 - year - old ash tree was planted to celebrate the birth of napoleon i 's first son . an investigation after the tragic accident found it was ridden with parasites that had rotted the wood and made it very unstable . napoleon bonaparte . the tree that crushed carolyn thorpe was planted to mark the birth of his son . the town hall of hiers - brouage has now paid more than € 100,000 , or £ 86,000 , in compensation for the tragic accident . it was found the tree had been weakened by parasites making it dangerously unstable , french website the local reports . of the sum , ms wright received € 42,000 ( £ 30,400 ) while € 77,000 ( £ 55,600 ) was paid out for ms thorpe 's death . the american ash tree - which was kept as a historical monument within the small town - was between six and seven metres high and measured 13 feet in diameter . when contacted by press agency afp the current mayor of hiers - brouage refused to comment . at the time of the accident the then - mayor was reported as saying : ' everyone thought that [ the tree ] would hold on for a while longer . '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 2007年，来自布里斯托尔的62岁卡罗琳·索普(Caroline Thorpe)被杀，其女儿莎拉·赖特(Sarah Wright)在法国度假时被倒下的树木击中受伤。事故发生时，他们正坐在法国耶尔布鲁阿格(Hiers-Brouage)的一家咖啡馆里。目前，耶尔布鲁阿格已向他们支付了数千美元的赔偿金。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一位布里斯托尔女子在法国度假时被一棵寄生虫滋生的古老树木砸死，其家人获得了约8.6万英镑的赔偿。2007年，62岁的卡罗琳·索普在法国西南部海滨小镇希尔斯-布鲁瓦日的一家咖啡馆外喝咖啡时，一棵20英尺高的树突然倒塌，将她压死。她的女儿萨拉·赖特也受伤。这棵美国梣树是200年前为纪念拿破仑一世的第一个儿子而种下的。调查发现，这棵树被寄生虫侵蚀，木质腐烂，非常不稳定。希尔斯-布鲁瓦日市政厅已支付超过10万欧元（约8.6万英镑）的赔偿金。这棵被保留为小镇历史遗迹的美国梣树高约6-7米，直径13英尺。目前市长拒绝就此事发表评论。事故发生时，当时的市长曾表示：“大家都以为（这棵树）还能撑一段时间。”

cnndm.src: police in north carolina say a married couple is dead after an amtrak train hit them on easter morning as they lingered on the tracks . derek lowe , 38 , and tina lowe , 33 , were hit shortly before 10 am on sunday in durham by a train heading north . amtrak spokesman marc magliari said train no. 80 , the carolinian , was headed from charlotte to new york city when the accident occurred on property owned by norfolk - southern . scroll down for video . derek lowe , 38 , and tina lowe , 33 , were struck and killed by an amtrak train shortly before 10 am on easter sunday in durham , north carolina . authorities say none of the 166 passengers on the train were injured , although a man who fell ill during the delay did receive treatment . the lowes were both pronounced dead at the scene , wral reported . the train continued on its route after a delay of about two hours and 45 minutes , according to magliari . authorities say none of the 166 passengers on the train were injured , although a man who fell ill during the delay did receive treatment . a man who met the pair while collecting scrap metal said they may have lived in a homeless camp , abc 11 reported . james thompson said : ' the last encounter i had with the man and woman was they had a grocery cart and they had a few items in it . ' they asked me would i use my truck to go over there because crossing the railroad tracks was so bad , and so hard with the cart . after the accident occurred , the train was delayed for almost three hours before continuing on its way . ' they 'll come up to me and want me to give them a little something . ' when you see a person that 's in dire straits , be kind to them . ' do n't condemn them . they 've got a heart . ' durham is located about 25 miles northwest of the train 's next destination , raleigh . the trip from charlotte to new york city usually takes about 13 hours and 30 minutes .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 一对已婚夫妇在周日上午约10点被一列Amtrak列车撞死，事发地点是在北卡罗来纳州的达勒姆市(Durham)。据报道，列车在出发前被延误了三个小时，列车上的乘客没有受伤。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 北卡罗来纳州警方表示，一对已婚夫妇在复活节早晨逗留在铁轨上时被一列美铁列车撞死。38岁的德里克·洛和33岁的蒂娜·洛在周日上午10点左右被一列开往北方的列车撞击，事故发生在诺福克-南方公司拥有的财产上。美铁发言人马克·马格利亚里表示，80号列车“卡罗莱纳号”当时正从夏洛特开往纽约市，事故发生后列车延误了约2小时45分钟。据报道，事故发生后，列车上的166名乘客都没有受伤，但一名在延误期间感到不适的男子接受了治疗。据报道，一名收集废金属的男子称，他曾遇到过这对夫妇，他们可能住在一个无家可归的营地。事故发生后，列车延误了近3个小时才继续前往下一个目的地。这名男子说：“他们会走到我面前，想让我给他们一点东西。当你看到一个处境艰难的人时，要善待他们，不要谴责他们。他们也有心。”事故发生地杜罕距离列车下一个目的地罗利约25英里。从夏洛特到纽约市的旅程通常需要13小时30分钟。

cnndm.src: marseille , france ( cnn ) investigators have collected all the main evidence from the site where germanwings flight 9525 crashed , a french national police official told cnn on saturday . investigators are not expected to return to the crash site , said capt. yves naffrechoux of the high mountain gendarmerie . the plane crashed march 24 in rugged terrain of the alps about 6 miles ( 10 kilometers ) from the town of seyne - les - alpes . " all the police investigators have left the ( germanwings ) crash site , " he said . " there is only a private security company ensuring security around the crash site so that no one can go there . " the security firm will guard the site until the remaining debris is collected and taken to secure locations for further analysis , if necessary , he said . the flight data recorder , or " black box , " was found thursday by a member of the recovery team . the cockpit voice recorder was found days after the crash . in addition , out of more than 2,000 dna samples collected from the crash site , lab workers have isolated 150 dna profiles , said brice robin , marseilles prosecutor . the crash killed all 150 people on board . brice robin , marseilles prosecutor , said authorities have found 470 personnel effects at the site . that number includes 40 cell phones , though all those were badly damaged . robin cast doubt that any useful information could be retrieved from those phones , given their condition . authorities say the flight 's co-pilot , andreas lubitz , locked the captain out of the cockpit and engineered the plane 's demise . initial tests on the flight data recorder show that lubitz purposely used the controls to speed up the plane 's descent , according to the french air accident investigation agency , the bea . it also has emerged that lubitz had battled depression years before he took the controls of flight 9525 and that he had concealed from his employer recent medical leave notes saying he was unfit for work . calls for crash avoidance technology . cnn 's margot haddad reported from marseille , and greg botelho wrote from atlanta . cnn 's laura smith - spark contributed to this report .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 3月24日，德国之翼航空9525号航班在阿尔卑斯山坠毁，机上150人全部遇难。当局表示，这起事故是副驾驶安德烈亚斯·卢比茨(Andreas Lubitz)故意策划的，他孤立了机长，并使用控制装置加速飞机，导致飞机坠毁。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 法国马赛（CNN）调查人员已经收集了德国之翼9525航班坠毁地点的所有主要证据，一位法国国家警察官员周六告诉CNN。调查人员不会返回坠机现场，高山宪兵队的Yves Naffrechoux上尉说。这架飞机于3月24日在阿尔卑斯山崎岖的地形上坠毁，距离塞恩-莱斯-阿尔普斯镇约6英里（10公里）。“所有警方调查人员都已离开（德国之翼）坠机现场，”他说。“只有一家私人安保公司在坠机现场周围提供安全保障，以防止任何人进入。”该安保公司将保护现场，直到剩余的残骸被收集并送往安全地点进行进一步分析，如果有必要的话，他说。飞行数据记录仪或“黑匣子”是由一名搜救队成员于周四发现的。驾驶舱语音记录仪是在坠机几天后发现的。此外，从坠机现场收集的2000多个DNA样本中，实验室工作人员已经分离出150个DNA样本，马赛检察官Brice Robin说。这次坠机造成了所有150名乘客遇难。马赛检察官Brice Robin说，当局在现场发现了470件人员物品。这个数字包括40部手机，但所有这些手机都被严重损坏。罗宾怀疑从这些手机中可以提取到任何有用的信息，考虑到它们的状况。当局表示，这次坠机的副驾驶安德烈亚斯·卢比茨（Andreas Lubitz）将机长锁在驾驶舱外，并策划了飞机的毁灭。法国航空事故调查局（BEA）的初步测试显示，卢比茨故意使用控制装置加速飞机的下降。此外，卢比茨曾在操纵9525航班之前与抑郁症作斗争，并且他曾隐瞒了最近的医疗请假记录，称他不适合工作。呼吁采用坠机避免技术。CNN的Margot Haddad从马赛报道，Greg Botelho从亚特兰大撰写。CNN的Laura Smith-Spark为本文做出了贡献。

cnndm.src: police have blasted motorists who played an impromptu game of football on the m25 after becoming stuck in a major traffic jam . long tailbacks built up on both sides of the carriageway as a stretch of the motorway between junctions four and five in ortford , kent was closed so an air ambulance could land to rescue a seriously injured female motorcyclist . but during the hour - long delay today , kent police received reports that people started kicking a ball about in the closed stretch of the road . motorists who were caught playing football on the m25 after becoming stuck in a major traffic jam on the motorway in kent . they tweeted : ' we have reports people are playing football in the static traffic on the m25 . ' this is dangerous . we ask that people remain in their vehicles . ' meanwhile at the same time two teenagers found themselves stranded on the wrong side of the motorway when the clockwise carriageway reopened . police said that the pair had walked to the opposite side after the road was closed and had to be escorted back to their vehicle by police after it reopened catching them unaware . a kent police spokesman said : ' the pair had reportedly walked across the motorway whilst the road was closed , but then were unable to get back when the road was re-opened . ' a patrol helped them return to their vehicle . ' police are now appealing for information following a serious road traffic collision on the m25 between junctions 4 and 5 . ' the anti-clockwise carriageway is still currently down to one lane and motorists are advised to avoid the area . kent police tweeted warning motorists to remain inside their vehicles while they were stuck in the gridlock . ' police are also keen to remind people to stay in their vehicles if they are stuck in stationary traffic . ' the accident at lunchtime today followed another serious incident in kent when a coach caught fire on an a2 slip road to the m25 near dartford . the blaze sent plumes of black smoke across the carriageway with footage taken by motorists showing the wreckage of the vehicle . the fire completely destroyed the coach and is believed to have started in the engine compartment and spread to the body of the vehicle .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: M25高速公路因一场交通事故而关闭，一名严重受伤的女摩托车手需要空中救护车援助。封锁期间，两名堵塞道路的青少年司机在封闭路段踢足球，导致警方发出警告。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 警方谴责在M25上被困的司机们在交通堵塞时举行了一场即兴的足球比赛。在肯特郡奥特福德的4号和5号出口之间的一段路段被关闭，以便空中救护直升机可以降落救援一名严重受伤的女摩托车手，导致双向车道都出现了长长的拥堵。但在今天的一个小时的延误中，肯特警方收到了有人在关闭的路段上踢球的报告。警方在推特上发文说：“我们收到有人在M25静止的交通中踢足球的报告。”这是危险的，我们要求人们留在自己的车内。”与此同时，两名青少年发现自己被困在了错的一侧，当顺时针车道重新开放时，他们不得不被警方护送回到他们的车辆上，因为他们在路被关闭时走到了对面。肯特警方发言人说：“这两人据称是在路被关闭时穿过了高速公路，但当路重新开放时无法返回。”巡逻队帮助他们返回车辆。”警方现在呼吁提供信息，因为在M25的4号和5号出口之间发生了一起严重的道路交通事故。”逆时针车道仍然只有一条车道开放，建议司机避开这个区域。”肯特警方在推特上警告司机们在交通拥堵时要留在车内。”警方也提醒人们，如果他们被困在静止的交通中，要留在自己的车内。”今天中午的事故发生在肯特郡另一起严重事件之后，当时一辆大巴在达特福德附近的M25出口的A2匝道上起火。火灾在车道上升起了黑烟，司机拍摄的画面显示了车辆的残骸。火灾完全摧毁了大巴，据信是从发动机舱开始蔓延到车身。

cnndm.src: a 12 - year - old boy who fell out of a five - storey window miraculously survived after landing on a car parked beneath the building . according to his father , the boy most likely fell while sleepwalking . the incident happened last saturday in nanchang , the provincial capital of jiangxi in southeastern china , reported the people ’s daily online . life - saving car : the 12 - year - old boy from nanchang was saved by this car parked underneath the building . miraculous : the kid fell from the fourth floor of this building while sleepwalking , according to his father . a hotel receptionist working across the road said she heard a loud bang around midnight , which she thought was a car accident . when she went out to have a look she discovered there was the body of a boy lying on top of a white car . the boy was crying out for help . ' the car ’s windscreen was shattered and there was a lot of blood , ' said the eyewitness . the receptionist added : ' the boy was conscious at the time and an ambulance was called to take him to the hospital . someone said that he had fallen from the fourth floor . ' he ’s really lucky . if it was n’t for the car , he would not have survived . ' doctors at the nanchang university medical hospital said that the boy did not have life - threatening injuries . the main injury was to his leg but he needed further observations . nonvital injuries : doctors said that the boy did not have life - threatening injuries but his leg was hurt . the boy ’s father said : “ i do n’t know how he fell out of the window but he said that he was sleepwalking . ” the public security bureau is further investigating the incident . however , the owner of the car , xiao deng , does n’t feel so lucky . scene of the incident : neighbours noticed the fall when the boy was on top of the car and yelling for help . deng was having dinner nearby and when he returned saw the damage to his car . he said that he bought the car just six months ago . he has called the insurance company but representative told him they have never handled such an incident before and needed to check to see how much of this is covered .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 周六，中国一名12岁男孩从五楼坠落并从下面偷了一辆车，奇迹般生还。他的父亲声称孩子在梦游时从窗户掉下来。但不幸的是，车主的车被撞了，他已致电保险公司商讨后续赔偿事宜。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名12岁的男孩从五层楼的窗户摔下，奇迹般地在楼下停着的一辆车上幸存。据他父亲说，这名男孩很可能是在梦游时摔下的。这起事件发生在上周六，报道称发生在中国东南部江西省的省会南昌。救命的车：这名来自南昌的12岁男孩被停在楼下的这辆车救了。奇迹：据他父亲说，这个孩子从四楼摔下来时正在梦游。一名在对面工作的酒店接待员说，她在午夜听到一声巨响，以为是车祸。当她出去看时，发现有一个男孩的身体躺在一辆白色车的顶部。男孩在呼救。目击者说：“车的挡风玻璃被打碎了，有很多血。”接待员补充说：“当时男孩还有意识，救护车被叫来把他送往医院。有人说他是从四楼摔下来的。”他真的很幸运。如果不是因为这辆车，他就不会幸存下来。”南昌大学医院的医生说，男孩没有生命危险的伤势。主要伤势是他的腿，但需要进一步观察。非生命危险伤：医生说，男孩没有生命危险的伤势，但他的腿受伤了。男孩的父亲说：“我不知道他是怎么从窗户摔下来的，但他说他在梦游。”公安局正在进一步调查这起事件。然而，这辆车的主人小邓并不觉得自己很幸运。事件现场：邻居们注意到男孩在车顶上大喊救命时发生了摔落。邓当时正在附近吃饭，回来后看到了他的车被损坏。他说他是六个月前买的这辆车。他已经打电话给保险公司，但代表告诉他，他们从未处理过这样的事故，需要检查看有多少是保险覆盖的。

cnndm.src: these are the shocking scenes as a cyclist in russia narrowly escapes death when a hgv knocks him from his bicycle following a reckless overtaking manoeuvre on a motorway . the cyclist is pedaling in front of his friend past a junction when the truck comes speeding along the inside , clipping the rider and throwing him clear of his bike . the second cyclist does not have any time to react to his friend 's accident and is knocked to the ground after careering into the stricken bicycle . this is the moment a russian truck flies past a cyclist , pictured , on the outskirts of st petersberg . the truck continued along the road for 100 metres before it was stopped by the driver on the hard shoulder . marathon rider ruslan bazarov , 28 , suffered pelvic injuries and a broken leg when the truck overtook him on the st petersburg ring road . bazarov was taking part in the first 100 kilometre ride of the season of the baltic star club when the incident happened . moments before the accident , bazarov made a hand signal to indicate that he was moving into the right hand lane , but the truck , which was carrying flour , sounded its horn and flashed by . bazarov was sucked in towards the truck 's trailer and knocked to the ground . the riders had planned to ride from poklonnaya hill , across the vyborg , primorsk and zelenogorsk highways with the planned finish at savushkina street in the city . the truck driver braked heavily as bazorov tumbled along the tarmac where he suffered fractrues . bazorov suffered two fractures to his legs and a pelvic area after the collision in st petersberg . the cyclist cried out in pain due to the serious nature of his injuries suffered during the collision . luckily bazorov bounced clear of the truck 's massive wheels although his bike was badly bent . the video , which has since gone viral on the internet has prompted members of russia 's cycling community to demand the creation of safe areas to ride . bazorov suffered a double fracture to his leg as a result of his accident . the truck 's driver pulled over to the side of the road after 100 metres and blamed bazarov for causing the incident . the driver can be heard on the video remarking : ' do n't complain , it 's your own fault . i was driving normally , bro ! ' fellow rider paul gavrilov , 35 , said : ' this accident should have been avoided because he could have been killed . if there were better cycle ways and proper access to the ones that exist it would make it safer . '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 鲁斯兰·巴扎罗夫(Ruslan Bazarov)在高速公路上鲁莽地超车时被卡车撞到，骨头骨折，险些丧命。事发后，司机将事故归咎于巴扎罗夫的危险行为。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 这是一篇关于俄罗斯一名骑自行车的人在高速公路上被一辆卡车撞倒的惊险场面。骑车人在朋友前面骑行时，一辆卡车从内侧高速驶来，撞到他并将他从自行车上摔下。第二名骑车人来不及反应，撞上了倒地的自行车。事故发生在圣彼得堡环城公路上，骑车人受了骨盆和腿部的伤。事故发生前，骑车人做了手势表示要转入右侧车道，但卡车却鸣笛并超车。骑车人被卡车的拖车吸引并摔倒在地。事故发生后，俄罗斯的骑行社区要求建立安全的骑行区域。骑车人受了双腿骨折和骨盆受伤，卡车司机则将责任归咎于骑车人。事故发生后，卡车司机停在路边，称这是骑车人自己的错。另一名骑车人表示，如果有更好的骑行道路和合理的进入方式，事故本可以避免。

cnndm.src: carwyn scott - howell 's death was a tragic accident , according to state prosecutor pierre yves michau . the family of tragic ski boy carwyn scott - howell were expected to bring his body home this weekend as an investigation into his death ruled out negligence as a factor . carwyn , seven , plunged 160ft to his death in flaine , france , while skiing with his mother ceri and siblings gerwyn and antonia , after becoming separated from them . according to state prosecutor pierre yves michau , the schoolboy ’s death earlier this month was ‘ a tragic accident ’ with no one to blame . the family , from talybont - on - usk , wales , were enjoying their last run of the holiday when antonia fell and her mother stopped to help . carwyn carried on skiing and then ventured into a wooded area . his mother thought he had continued to their accommodation but raised the alarm when he did not return . mr michau said : ‘ the inquiry has found the piste was well signposted . the boy would have been aware that he was leaving the piste . the reason why is not known but it was by error . ‘ had he been with someone bigger or older , the accident would n’t have happened but it remains a dramatic and tragic accident . ’ in a statement released to the foreign office , his family described carwyn as a ' daring , outgoing , determined little boy ' and a ' very competent skier and snowboarder ' . they said they were enjoying their last ski run together when carwyn 's sister ' lost her ski on a jump and at this point carwyn skied ahead ' . ' he was a very daring outgoing determined little boy whose handsome smile lit up any room and made life full of laughter with never a dull moment . seven years is too short a time to be an angel in the sky . ' carwyn was a very competent skier and snowboarder who had started skiing at the age of three and spent several weeks each year skiing . we had spent the most happy ski holiday together in the french ski resort of flaine . ' the statement went on to explain how the family became separated on their last run of the day . ' the family were all enjoying their last ski run over the small jumps and bumps at the side of the slope together , when carwyn 's sister lost her ski on a jump and at this point carwyn skied ahead , ' it said . ' the family can not explain their feeling of utter devastation with a vast void in their hearts . ' carwyn , seven , from talybont - on - usk , wales , plunged 160ft to his death in flaine , france .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 3月3日，7岁的卡温·斯科特-豪厄尔(Carwyn Scott-Howell)在法国弗莱恩(Flaine)的一次滑雪事故中丧生。州检察官皮埃尔·伊夫·米肖(Pierre Yves Michau)表示，死亡是一场悲惨事故，没有人应该承担责任。家人形容卡温是一个勇敢、外向、意志坚定的小男孩，也是一名非常有能力的滑雪运动员。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 根据法国检察官皮埃尔·伊夫·米绍的说法，七岁的滑雪男孩卡温·斯科特-豪尔的死亡是一起悲剧性的意外事故，没有人应该受到责备。这个来自威尔士塔利邦-安-厄斯克的家庭本周末将带回他的遗体，调查结果排除了疏忽的因素。卡温和他的母亲、兄弟姐妹一起滑雪时，不慎与他们走散，从法国的弗莱讷滑落160英尺。米绍表示：“调查发现滑道标志清晰可见，男孩应该意识到自己离开了滑道。原因不明，可能是出于错误。如果他和一个更大、更老的人在一起，这场事故就不会发生，但仍然是一起悲剧性的意外。”卡温的家人在一份声明中称他为“勇敢、外向、坚定的小男孩”，也是一位“非常有能力的滑雪和滑雪板运动员”。他们在最后一次滑雪时不慎分散，家人无法用言语表达他们的悲痛和心中的巨大空虚。卡温来自威尔士塔利邦-安-厄斯克，他在法国弗莱讷滑落160英尺身亡，享年七岁。

cnndm.src: a toddler was struck and killed by his teen uncle who was driving while under the influence , according to police . two - year - old landen martin ran behind the vehicle as his uncle was attempting to back out of the driveway of a gainesville , georgia home on sunday at 12.25 pm , according to georgia state patrol cpl. auston allen . joshua saunders , 19 , was arrested on charges including dui , reckless driving , leaving the scene of an accident and vehicular homicide , according to the gainesville times . officials said martin was pronounced dead at northeast georgia medical center . scroll down for video . two - year - old landen martin ( left ) was struck and killed on sunday by the car his 19 - year - old uncle joshua saunders ( right ) was driving . joshua saunders , who authorities said was driving while under the influence , was attempting to back out of the driveway of a gainesville , georgia home when martin ran behind the car ( above the 1978 chevrolet k10 he was driving ) georgia state patrol said following the accident , joshua saunders got out the car and saw what happened but left the scene . he was then spotted less than a mile from where the incident occurred by a hall county sheriff 's deputy and was taken back to the scene . ' he was standing right there playing and josh went to back up and josh jumped out of the truck and started screaming , ' landen ! landen ! ' martin 's grandmother and joshua saunders ' mother , martha saunders told channel 2 . ' he did n't mean to hit that baby . he did n't . he loved him . ' joshua saunders was arrested on charges including dui , reckless driving , leaving the scene of an accident and vehicular homicide ( above the driveway of the gainesville , georgia home ) martin 's grandmother and also joshua saunders ' mother , martha saunders ( above ) said : ' he [ joshua saunders ] did n't mean to hit that baby . he did n't . he loved him ' martin and joshua saunders ' family said the teen was not aware that the child had run into the path of the chevrolet he was driving at the time . ' it was an accident and accidents happen , ' the toddler 's mother , kristian saunders , told cbs 46 . joshua saunders was extremely remorseful and was also cooperative with authorities , according to investigators . the family has said that they do not want joshua saunders to be put behind bars , and he is currently being held at the hall county jail . ' he loved his uncle josh , ' smith told cbs . ' we want to roll back time , we want to roll back a day . ' allen said that toxicology tests on joshua saunders ' blood - alcohol content are pending .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 周日，两岁的兰登·马丁(Landon Martin)被他酒驾的叔叔撞死。19岁的乔舒亚·桑德斯(Joshua Sanders)在事故发生时正在倒车，于当天在其住所被逮捕，并被控酒驾、危险驾驶、肇事逃逸和交通肇事致人死亡。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名两岁的幼童被其酒驾的十九岁叔叔撞死，事发于周日下午12点25分，地点为佐治亚州盖恩斯维尔的一处住宅。据佐治亚州巡逻队军士奥斯顿·艾伦称，幼童兰登·马丁在其叔叔乔舒亚·桑德斯试图从车道后退时，跑到车辆后面，被撞倒。桑德斯被控酒驾、危险驾驶、逃逸事故和过失杀人等罪名。幼童的祖母和桑德斯的母亲表示，桑德斯并不是故意撞到幼童的，他非常爱他。桑德斯被捕后，他们希望他不要被关进监狱。调查人员称，桑德斯非常懊悔，并且配合了调查。幼童的母亲表示，这是一场意外，事故难免发生。目前，桑德斯被关押在霍尔县监狱。调查人员正在等待桑德斯的血液酒精含量的毒理学检测结果。

cnndm.src: tate ricks ( pictured above ) , nine , was reportedly fishing with his grandma 's boyfriend when their boat capsized and he was not found at shore . authorities are searching a florida river for a nine - year - old boy who went missing after a boat carrying him and a family friend was hit with a wake causing the boat to capsize . putnam county sheriff 's office said tate ricks immediately went under water in the st johns river and the unidentified man with him attempted to save ricks but could not , according to cbs . the man was able to make it to shore , deputies said . on sunday , officials said they were using sonar and thermal imaging in the water and on the coastline in efforts to rescue the boy , captain joe wells told first coast news . officials also said they plan to continue the air search later in the day bringing in divers . they hope to continue the search as long as conditions are safe , and stated previously the operation is for a rescue and not a recovery . ricks , a third grade student at kelly smith elementary school in palatka , was reportedly with his grandmother 's boyfriend fishing when the boating accident occurred . their 14 - foot johnboat was hit by the wake from a large boat around 5.30 pm , according to news4jax . the boy is believed to not have been wearing a life jacket , according to investigators , and the impact from the wake sent them both into the river . crews began a rescue operation on saturday around 6 pm , and officials did confirm they discovered the capsized boat . authorities said the search area for ricks includes the st johns river from us - 17 to memorial bridge to the north , and pico road to the south . the wildlife conservation commission is leading the investigation and the sheriff 's office is leading the search , according to the florida times - union . ' we are not going to send crews home tonight . they will remain on the river all night long , ' wells told news4jax . ' we will switch to a different crew in the morning and continue right on through the weekend , into next week , whatever it takes to locate this young man and bring closure to his family . ' a woman who identified herself as ricks ' grandmother said the family is working to stay positive . suzette guess told news4jax : ' everybody 's just trying to hang together . come together and do a lot of praying . ' she described ricks as a ' fun - loving kid ' who liked hunting , fishing and nascar . ' pray that they find him and that 's he 's okay . just remember us and his mama . he 's got a little sister think of her too , ' she added . wells told times - union that the incident is being investigated as a boating accident and that no foul play is suspected .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 周六下午，九岁的泰特·里克斯(Tate Ricks)与祖母的男友一起钓鱼时，船被尾流击中，导致他掉进河里失踪。救援队仍在继续寻找男孩的下落，搜索可能会持续长达一周的时间。与此同时，警方正在调查事故原因。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 据报道，九岁的泰特·里克斯与奶奶的男朋友一起钓鱼时，船只翻沉，他在河岸附近失踪。当局正在佛罗里达州的一条河流中搜寻这名九岁男孩，他与一位家庭朋友一起乘坐的船只被大浪击中，导致船只翻沉。据CBS报道，普特南县警长办公室表示，泰特·里克斯立即被水淹没在圣约翰河中，与他一起的男子试图救他，但未能成功。这名男子成功游到岸边，警长说。周日，官员们表示，他们正在使用声纳和热成像技术在水中和海岸线上搜寻这名男孩，约瑟夫·威尔斯船长告诉第一海岸新闻。官员们还表示，他们计划在当天晚些时候继续空中搜索，带来潜水员。他们希望在条件安全的情况下继续搜寻，并先前声明，这次行动是为了营救而不是恢复。据报道，里克斯是帕拉特卡凯利·史密斯小学三年级学生，据称在他奶奶的男朋友钓鱼时发生了这起船只事故。据News4Jax报道，他们的14英尺约翰船被一艘大船的浪击中，发生在下午5点30分左右。调查人员表示，这名男孩可能没有穿救生衣，浪击导致他们两人都落入河中。救援队伍在周六下午6点左右开始营救行动，官员们确认发现了翻沉的船只。当局表示，里克斯的搜寻范围包括从北部的美国17号公路到纪念桥，以及南部的皮科路的圣约翰河。野生动物保护委员会负责调查，警长办公室负责搜寻，据佛罗里达时报联盟报道。威尔斯告诉Times-Union，这起事件正在调查为一起船只事故，没有嫌疑人。她自称为里克斯的奶奶的一位女士表示，家人正在努力保持积极态度。苏泽特·猜测告诉News4Jax：“每个人都在努力团结在一起。一起祈祷。”她描述里克斯是一个“爱玩的孩子”，喜欢打猎、钓鱼和NASCAR。她补充说：“祈祷他们能找到他，他能平安无事。记住我们和他妈妈。他有一个小妹妹，也要想到她。”威尔斯告诉时报联盟，这起事件正在调查为一起船只事故，没有嫌疑人。

cnndm.src: ( cnn ) the last three defendants prosecuted in the hazing death of florida a&m drum major robert champion were convicted friday of manslaughter and hazing with the result of death , reported cnn affiliate wftv . a jury deliberated about 2 1/2 hours before returning guilty verdicts against benjamin mcnamee , 25 ; aaron golson , 22 ; and darryl cearnel , 28 . they will be sentenced june 26 , according to orange county , florida , online court records . until then , they 'll be held in the county jail . champion , 26 , died in november 2011 after a band hazing ritual in which he was beaten aboard a school bus after a football game in orlando , florida . the initiation required pledges to run down the center of the bus while being punched , kicked and assaulted by senior members , band members have said . a medical examiner ruled champion 's death a homicide and said he died within an hour of being beaten . champion suffered multiple blunt trauma blows , the medical examiner said . a total of 15 defendants were charged originally , but most took plea deals , wftv reported . last october , dante martin stood trial and was convicted of the same charges . he was sentenced to 77 months in prison .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 2011年佛罗里达州A&M鼓手罗伯特·钱皮恩(Robert Champion)欺凌致死案中，三名被告被控过失杀人和欺凌致死罪，将于6月26日被判刑。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: ( CNN ) 最后三名被起诉的被告在佛罗里达州A&M大学鼓手罗伯特·钱伯斯顿的死亡案件中被判犯有过失杀人和违反死亡的罪名，据CNN附属机构WFTV报道。陪审团花了大约2个半小时的时间进行审判，最终判定本杰明·麦克纳米（25岁）、亚伦·戈尔森（22岁）和达里尔·塞尔内尔（28岁）有罪。根据佛罗里达州奥兰治县的在线法庭记录，他们将在6月26日被判刑。在此之前，他们将被关押在县监狱。钱伯斯顿在2011年11月在奥兰多佛罗里达州的一场足球比赛后的乐队入会仪式中被殴打致死。据乐队成员称，入会仪式要求新成员在校车中跑过中间，同时被高年级成员殴打、踢踹和袭击。法医鉴定钱伯斯顿的死亡为谋杀，并称他在被殴打后一个小时内死亡。法医称钱伯斯顿遭受了多次钝性外伤。总共有15名被告最初被起诉，但大多数都接受了认罪协议，WFTV报道。去年10月，但丹特·马丁接受审判，并被判犯有同样的罪名。他被判处77个月监禁。

cnndm.src: cairo ( cnn ) an egyptian court has sentenced 71 people to life in prison for their role in the august 2013 burning of a christian church in the giza province village of kafr hakim , state news reports . the virgin mary church was torched and looted by a mob , some of whom chanted against coptic christians and called for egypt to become an " islamic state , " one of at least 42 churches and many more businesses and homes targeted that august , the advocacy group human rights watch reports . others attacked included st. george church in sohag , a city south of cairo on the nile river , and prince tadros church in fayoum , which is southwest of cairo , according to reports . in addition to those getting life sentences , two minors were sentenced to 10 years in prison and fined 10,000 egyptian pounds ( about $ 1,300 ) , egypt 's official egynews reported . most of those sentenced -- 52 of the 73 defendants -- were tried in absentia , with 21 already in prison , according to egynews . some blamed the church and other attacks on supporters of the muslim brotherhood , the islamist movement that backed mohamed morsy . morsy became egypt 's first democratically elected president following the ouster of longtime leader hosni mubarak . morsy was pushed out by egypt 's military . morsy was sentenced to 20 years in prison earlier this month after being convicted on charges related to violence outside the presidential palace in december 2012 . but he was acquitted of murder in the deaths of protesters . christian churches across egypt stormed , torched . journalist sarah sirgany reported from cairo and cnn 's greg botelho reported and wrote this story from atlanta .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 2013年8月埃及焚烧基督教教堂事件中，71人被判处无期徒刑，两名未成年人被判处10年监禁并罚款10,000埃及镑。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 开罗（CNN）埃及一家法院判处71人终身监禁，因为他们参与了2013年8月在吉萨省卡夫哈基姆村烧毁一座基督教教堂的事件，据国家新闻报道。圣母教堂被暴徒纵火和抢劫，其中一些人高呼反对科普特基督徒，并呼吁埃及成为“伊斯兰国家”，人权组织人权观察报告称，当月至少有42座教堂和更多的商业和住宅遭到袭击。其他遭到袭击的还包括开罗南部尼罗河上的索哈格市的圣乔治教堂和开罗西南部的法尤姆的塔德罗斯王子教堂，据报道。除了被判终身监禁的人外，还有两名未成年人被判处10年监禁，并处以1万埃及镑（约1300美元）罚款，埃及官方的埃及新闻报道。大多数被判的人中，有52人是在缺席审判的情况下被判的，其中21人已经在监狱中，据埃及新闻报道。一些人将教堂和其他袭击事件归咎于穆斯林兄弟会的支持者，这是支持穆罕默德·穆尔西的伊斯兰主义运动。穆尔西成为埃及首位民选总统，随后被长期领导人穆巴拉克推翻。穆尔西被埃及军方推翻。本月早些时候，穆尔西因与2012年12月总统府外暴力事件有关的指控被判处20年监禁。但他被无罪释放涉嫌杀害抗议者。埃及各地的基督教教堂遭到袭击，被烧毁。记者萨拉·西尔加尼从开罗报道，CNN的格雷格·博特尔霍从亚特兰大报道并撰写了这篇报道。

cnndm.src: ( cnn ) chinese police have arrested more than 133,000 people and seized 43.3 tons of illegal narcotics during a six - month anti-drug campaign , the country 's ministry of public security has announced . authorities also handled 115,000 drug - related crimes -- such as robbery -- and 606,000 cases of drug use during the nationwide campaign to " ban drugs in hundreds of cities , " liu yuejin , assistant minister of public security , said wednesday . the figures were nearly double the same period a year earlier , while the amount of narcotics seized was up by 44.9 % , according to the ministry . liu said drug trafficking groups have " suffered a heavy blow " and drug users have been " forcefully regulated . " however , the police also paid a price , liu said , in quotes carried by the state - run xinhua news agency . nine police officers died and another 657 were wounded in the mission , with 76 severely wounded . the ministry rewarded 60 units and 100 people . liu said china 's drug - related problems were still severe , with online drug trafficking an increasing problem . he said the ministry had launched a three - month online campaign starting in april targeting people engaged in drug - related internet crimes . over the past nine months , a string of movie and television stars , film directors and pop singers have been arrested and charged over drug related incidents , including jaycee chan , son of kung fu movie star jackie chan , who was convicted on a drug charge and sentenced to six months in prison by a beijing court . in august last year , dozens of management agencies representing actors and singers signed an agreement with beijing authorities banning drug use from the entertainment industry and pledging to sack any artists who broke the law .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 在为期六个月的扫毒行动中，中国警方逮捕了133,000多人，查获毒品43.3吨，比去年同期大幅增加。此外，过去9个月，娱乐圈不少明星也被指控涉毒罪名。然而，缉毒行动取得巨大成功的同时，警方也付出了巨大的代价。行动中共有9名警察死亡，数百人受伤。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 中国警方宣布，在为期六个月的禁毒运动中，已逮捕了超过13.3万人，缴获了43.3吨非法毒品。此外，他们还处理了11.5万起毒品相关犯罪案件和60.6万起毒品使用案件。据公安部副部长刘跃进称，这些数字几乎是去年同期的两倍，缴获的毒品数量增加了44.9%。刘跃进表示，毒品贩运团伙受到了“沉重打击”，毒品使用者也受到了“强力规范”。然而，警方也付出了代价，刘跃进在国家新华社的报道中称，有9名警察牺牲，657人受伤，其中76人重伤。公安部奖励了60个单位和100人。刘跃进表示，中国的毒品问题仍然严重，网络贩毒是一个日益严重的问题。他说，公安部已经在4月份发起了为期三个月的网络运动，针对从事毒品相关网络犯罪的人。在过去的九个月中，一系列电影和电视明星、电影导演和流行歌手因毒品相关事件被逮捕和起诉，包括功夫影星成龙的儿子房祖名，他被北京法院判处六个月监禁。去年8月，数十家代表演员和歌手的管理机构与北京当局签署了一项协议，禁止娱乐业界使用毒品，并承诺解雇任何违法者。

cnndm.src: it was meant to be the ultimate symbol of menace : carving ' 666 ' into his forehead . but in a phenomenal case of idiocy , convicted murderer nikko jenkins used a mirror - so the numbers came out backwards . the symbol is described in the biblical book of revelation as ' the sign of the beast ' , and has since been popularized by the horror movie the omen . however , with a series of upside - down 9s , jenkins has fashioned himself an entirely unique - and irreversible - engraving . botched : nikko jenkins ( pictured in 2014 ) recently tried to carve ' 666 ' into his forehead but did it backwards . according to omaha.com , jenkins told his attorney about the incident in a phone call from his cell in omaha , nebraska . it comes amid the 28 - year - old 's ongoing appeal that he is mentally unstable and therefore ineligible to face the death penalty . jenkins was jailed exactly one year ago for shooting dead four people in 10 days after being released from prison . during his murder trial in douglas county , jenkins was assessed by a doctor who concluded that he was ' a psychopath ' and ' one of the most dangerous people ' he had ever encountered . ' psychopath ' : the 28 - year - old , who a doctor described as ' one of the most dangerous people ' he had ever encountered , may use the botched case of self - mutilation as evidence he is mentally unstable . jenkins pleaded not guilty , then guilty , then ineligible for trial on the grounds of insanity . however , a judge dismissed the appeals and he was sentenced to life . the decision of whether he would be sentenced to death was delayed after jenkins revealed he had carved a swastika into his skin . following months of delays , he will face a panel in july to decide his fate . it is believed jenkins may use his latest botched case of self - mutilation as further evidence that he is mentally unstable .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 28岁的詹金斯正在采取一系列自残行为，让自己成为一名精神病患者，以此来避免死刑。一年前，詹金斯出狱后10天内开枪射击4人，被判处死刑。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 在一起令人震惊的案件中，被判有罪的杀人犯尼科·詹金斯试图在自己的额头上刻下“666”这一最终的威胁符号，但由于使用了镜子，数字却出现了倒过来。这个符号在《圣经·启示录》中被描述为“兽的标记”，并因恐怖电影《魔咒》而广为人知。然而，詹金斯却用一系列倒置的9来刻下了一个完全独特且无法逆转的雕刻。据报道，詹金斯在内布拉斯加州奥马哈的监狱里向他的律师透露了这一事件。这发生在他28岁生日的一年后，当时他因在被释放出狱后的10天内杀害了四人而被监禁。在他的谋杀审判中，一位医生评估了他的精神状态，得出结论称他是“精神病患者”和“他所遇到的最危险的人之一”。詹金斯曾先后表示过无罪、有罪和因精神不稳定而无法接受审判。然而，法官驳回了他的上诉，他被判终身监禁。关于他是否会被判死刑的决定被推迟，因为詹金斯透露他曾在自己的皮肤上刻下纳粹标志。经过数月的延迟，他将在7月面对一个小组来决定他的命运。据信，詹金斯可能会利用他最新的自残事件作为进一步证明他精神不稳定的证据。

cnndm.src: a yob who stole a mobile phone from a man who lay dying in the street shouted and swore outside a court appearance . scott stephenson is due to be jailed for stealing a phone from a man he found collapsed in the street in south shields , tyne and wear . he unleashed an extraordinary expletive - filled rant outside court this week after he was re-bailed for sentence following his failure to turn up to a previous hearing . scott stephenson shouted and swore outside court after he was bailed ahead of his sentencing for a theft in which he stole a phone from a man dying of hypothermia . stephenson was due to be sentenced for the offence , but failed to turn up to a previous court hearing . scott stephenson had been due to be jailed for the incident after admitting theft , but he skipped bail until he was arrested and sent back to court . the 19 - year - old , from south shields , rifled through his 22 - year - old unnamed victim 's pockets and made off with the iphone 4 . his victim had tripped and fallen unconscious on the cold december day . stephenson and friend dale walker , 25 , found him but - instead of calling for help - took his phone and abandoned the man . the next morning the victim 's body was discovered close to a playground , and a post mortem examination revealed he had died from hypothermia during the cold december night . stephenson found the man lying on the floor on a cold december evening but instead of calling for help he and friend stole the man 's iphone . members of the public looked on in horror during the extraordinary outburst near newcastle crown court . stephenson made rude gestures outside south tyneside magistrates when he appeared last month to plead guilty to theft and walker admitted handling stolen goods . appearing before newcastle crown court on tuesday , stephenson made similar gestures as he stood on the street where members of the public were eating lunch . he was seized on monday after a warrant was issued for his arrest when his failure to appear left his co-defendant sitting in the dock alone and his victim 's family in anguish . he was re-bailed for the sentence - which will be arranged for a later date after a pre-sentence report has been prepared .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 斯科特·斯蒂芬森(Scott Stephenson)是一名来自南希尔兹(South Shields)的19岁朋克，因在街上偷了一名垂死男子的手机而入狱。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名混混在南希尔兹街头偷走一名男子的手机，而这名男子当时正在街上冻死。这名混混在法庭外大喊大叫，之后被重新保释等待判决。他和一名朋友发现这名男子倒在地上，却没有报警，而是偷走了他的手机。第二天，这名男子的尸体被发现，验尸结果显示他死于严寒。这名混混在法庭外做出粗鲁的手势，最终被逮捕并重新保释等待判决。

cnndm.src: a wisconsin sex offender traveled to the middle east to try and join isis , but came back after he failed to cross the turkey - syria border , authorities have claimed . joshua van haften , 34 , of madison , was arrested wednesday night at o'hare international airport in chicago after returning on a flight from turkey . he has now been charged in a criminal complaint with attempting to provide material support to a foreign terrorist organization . joshua van haften , 34 , of madison , wisconsin ( pictured left in his mugshot on wednesday and right in 2010 when he registed on the sex offender 's list ) has been accused of flying to isis in a failed attempt to join isis . the criminal complaint , which had been under seal since oct. 28 , alleges that van haften talked to people about his plan before leaving the united states in august for istanbul . the complaint cites facebook posts from van haften that said he was unable to cross the border from turkey into syria . in one post , van haften complained that the people who were supposed to help him just wanted his money , that he had almost no cash left and that he was dropped off on a road in the country and never picked up . wisconsin court records showed several previous convictions for van haften , including felony battery in 1998 , second degree felony sexual assault in 1999 and disorderly conduct , a misdemeanor , in 2007 , online court records show . he was apprehended at o'hare international airport in chicago on wednesday after getting off a return flight from syria ( file picture ) all of the offenses occurred in rock county . van haften was sentenced to three years ' probation on the battery conviction in 1998 , but his probation was revoked in 1999 and he was sentenced to a year in jail . he was sentenced to eight years ' probation on the sexual assault charge in 1999 , but that was revoked in 2000 . he was then sentenced to seven years in prison . assistant attorney general carlin from the department of justice said stopping people from traveling to the region to join the islamic state is a ' top priority ' . she said in a statement : ' stemming the flow of foreign fighters to iraq and syria and holding accountable those who attempt to provide material support to designated foreign terrorist organizations remains a top priority for the national security division . '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 34岁的约书亚·范·哈夫滕(Joshua Van Haaften)周三在试图穿越土耳其-叙利亚边境失败回国时被捕，据称他试图向国外的恐怖组织提供帮助。范哈夫滕有多项犯罪记录，曾被判犯有袭击和性侵犯罪。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名威斯康星州的性犯罪者前往中东试图加入伊斯兰国，但因未能越过土耳其-叙利亚边境而返回，当局称。34岁的乔舒亚·范哈夫滕于周三晚上在芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场被捕，他从土耳其返回的航班。他现在被控在刑事投诉中试图为外国恐怖组织提供物质支持。投诉书称，范哈夫在离开美国前曾与人谈论过他的计划，于8月前往伊斯坦布尔。投诉书引用了范哈夫的Facebook帖子，称他无法从土耳其进入叙利亚的边境。在一篇帖子中，范哈夫抱怨说那些应该帮助他的人只想要他的钱，他几乎没有现金了，他被放在一个国家的路上，却没有被接走。威斯康星州的法院记录显示，范哈夫有几项前科，包括1998年的重罪殴打、1999年的二级重罪性侵和2007年的扰乱秩序（轻罪），在线法院记录显示。所有的罪行都发生在洛克县。范哈夫在1998年的殴打罪被判处三年缓刑，但他的缓刑在1999年被撤销，他被判处一年监禁。他在1999年的性侵罪被判处八年缓刑，但在2000年被撤销。然后他被判处七年监禁。司法部助理检察长卡林表示，阻止人们前往该地区加入伊斯兰国是“最重要的任务”。她在一份声明中说：“阻止外国战士前往伊拉克和叙利亚，并追究那些试图为指定的外国恐怖组织提供物质支持的人的责任，仍然是国家安全部门的首要任务。”

cnndm.src: a briton jailed in burma for using an image of the buddha to promote his bar has been ‘ abandoned ’ by the foreign office , according to human rights campaigners . phil blackwood was sentenced to two - and - a-half years with hard labour by a burmese court last month after posting the mocked - up image of the buddha wearing dj headphones on facebook . the tongue - in - cheek advert for a cheap - drinks night at the vgastro bar in rangoon provoked outrage among devout buddhists . scroll down for video . phil blackwood ( left ) was sentenced to two - and - a-half years with hard labour by a burmese court last month after posting a mocked - up image of buddha wearing dj headphones on facebook . human rights campaigners claim he has been ' abandoned ' by the foreign office . the 32 - year - old bar manager , who has dual new zealand and british nationality , was found guilty of insulting religion along with the bar ’s burmese owner and another manager , despite apologising profusely for posting the picture . all three were given the same sentence . mps and human rights campaigners said mr blackwood , who is married with a young daughter , is enduring appalling conditions in the notorious insein prison . they also claimed the british government had ‘ turned its back ’ on mr blackwood , who lived in middlesbrough until his family moved to new zealand when he was four . the 32 - year - old bar manager , who has dual new zealand and british nationality , was found guilty of insulting religion because of this picture . in a commons answer , a foreign office minister admitted he was not aware mr blackwood was a british citizen . last night , his father brian insisted that the family had informed the british authorities of his son ’s dual nationality after his arrest . although new zealand diplomats were taking the lead , he said that the family expected the foreign office to exert pressure on burma . middlesbrough mp andy mcdonald said : ' philip blackwood has been unjustly imprisoned for an honest mistake for which he has already issued a heartfelt apology . ' as a british citizen , rather than turning their back on mr blackwood , the foreign and commonwealth office should be pulling every available leaver to secure his immediate and unconditional release so that he can return to his family . ' there is international concern over a surge of religious nationalism in burma , ruled until recently by a military junta . a foreign and commonwealth office spokesman said : ‘ our ambassador in burma made clear that we were following the case closely when he raised it with the burmese minister of the presidency . ‘ our embassy in rangoon has provided advice and support to the new zealanders on mr blackwood ’s case . ’
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 32岁的菲尔·布莱克伍德(Phil Blackwood)上个月在Facebook上发布了戴着DJ耳机的佛像模型，后被缅甸法院以侮辱宗教罪判处两年半监禁。这一判决引发了英国人权活动人士的不满，他们认为这引发了英国外交部抛弃本国公民的行为。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名英国人因在Facebook上发布佛祖戴着DJ耳机的图片来宣传他的酒吧，被缅甸法院判处两年半的劳动教养，但根据人权活动人士的说法，他已经被外交部“抛弃”。上个月，菲尔·布莱克伍德被缅甸法院判处两年半的劳动教养，因为他发布的这张嘲笑性的广告图片激怒了虔诚的佛教徒。32岁的酒吧经理布莱克伍德拥有新西兰和英国双重国籍，他和酒吧的缅甸老板以及另一名经理都被判有罪，尽管他们都已经表示了深深的道歉。人权活动人士和议员们表示，布莱克伍德在臭名昭著的因赛恩监狱遭受着可怕的条件，而英国政府已经“转身离开”了他。外交部长承认，他并不知道布莱克伍德是英国公民。布莱克伍德的父亲坚称，家人在他被捕后已经通知了英国当局他拥有双重国籍。尽管新西兰外交官正在主导此事，但他说家人期望外交部向缅甸施加压力。米德尔斯堡议员安迪·麦克唐纳德表示：“菲利普·布莱克伍德因为一个诚实的错误而被不公正地监禁，他已经发表了衷心的道歉。作为一名英国公民，外交和联邦事务部门不应该转身离开布莱克伍德先生，而应该尽一切努力确保他立即和无条件地获释，回到家人身边。”缅甸最近才结束军事独裁统治，国际社会对宗教民族主义的激增表示关注。外交和联邦事务部门发言人表示：“我们在缅甸的大使已经明确表示，我们正在密切关注这个案件，他在与缅甸总统部长的会谈中提出了这个问题。我们在仰光的大使馆为布莱克伍德先生的案件提供了建议和支持。”

cnndm.src: tiger woods was pictured giving his children hugs during the second day of practice at augusta national golf club ahead of the masters 2015 . he was also joined on the course by long - term skier girlfriend lindsey vonn . the former world no1 has returned to action after taking a break from golf to recover from a series of niggling injuries and rediscover his form . the first practice session on monday had been woods ' first public appearance for 60 days . tiger woods hugs his young children , charlie ( left ) and sam ( right ) during the practice round at augusta . woods ' long - term girlfriend lindsey vonn ( right ) stands with charlie as he warms up for the masters 2015 . despite now being placed at 111th in the world rankings , woods believes the hiatus has done him good and he is in the right shape to win the 15th major of his career . ' i felt like i had to get my game into a spot where i could compete to win a golf tournament , ' he said . ' and it 's finally there . ' woods has not won a major since the us open in 2008 and the last of his four masters wins was a decade ago , with the american only confirming on friday that he would compete at augusta this year . woods has returned to action following a break from golf he took to work on his game and rediscover form . vonn is flanked by woods ' children as she talks to northern ireland 's rory mcilroy at augusta on tuesday .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 泰格·伍兹(Tiger Woods )与他的孩子和女友林赛·沃恩(Lindsey Vonn)在奥古斯塔国家高尔夫俱乐部(Augusta National Golf Club)的球场上练习高尔夫。短暂休息后，泰格·伍兹可能会重返球场为 2015 年美国大师赛热身。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 在2015年大师赛的第二天练习中，老虎伍兹被拍到给他的孩子们拥抱。他的长期滑雪女友林赛·冯（Lindsey Vonn）也加入了球场。这位前世界排名第一的选手在休息了一段时间后重返赛场，以恢复状态和找回状态。周一的第一次练习是伍兹60天来的首次公开露面。老虎伍兹在奥古斯塔的练习回合中拥抱他的孩子们，查理（左）和山姆（右）。伍兹的长期女友林赛·冯（右）和查理一起热身准备2015年大师赛。尽管现在世界排名第111位，但伍兹相信这段休息时间对他有好处，他已经准备好赢得他职业生涯的第15个大满贯。他说：“我觉得我必须把我的比赛状态调整到可以竞争赢得高尔夫比赛的水平，现在终于达到了这个水平。”伍兹自2008年美国公开赛以来没有赢得过大满贯，他最后一次赢得大师赛是十年前，上周五他才确认今年会参加奥古斯塔赛。伍兹休息一段时间后重返赛场，以改善他的比赛状态和找回状态。冯恩在周二的奥古斯塔与北爱尔兰的罗里·麦克罗伊（Rory McIlroy）交谈时，两边都有伍兹的孩子们。

cnndm.src: two islamic teachers will stand trial accused of repeatedly beating a ten - year - old boy - for wrongly reciting the koran . mohammed waqar , 23 , and mohammed siddique , 60 , are accused of assaulting the youngster at the uk islamic mission 's ( ukim ) jamia mosque in sparkbrook , birmingham . the boy was allegedly slapped repeatedly during religious lessons at the mosque between may 1 and june 13 last year . mohammed waqar , 23 , and mohammed siddique , 60 , are accused of assaulting a youngster at the uk islamic mission jamia mosque in sparkbrook , birmingham . it 's alleged was allegedly slapped repeatedly for mistakes in his studies , including not reciting the koran correctly during religious lessons at the mosque in sparkbrook . a court heard the attack happened when the boy made mistakes with his studies , including failing to read the koran properly . it is claimed on one occasion he suffered a black eye . waqar and siddique , both of tyseley in birmingham , were arrested by officers from west midlands police last june . they are due to stand trial at birmingham crown court on august 10 , charged with cruelty to a person under 16 , contrary to section 1 ( 1 ) of the children and young persons act 1933 . the maximum sentence for the offence of cruelty to a person under 16 is ten years prison . both mr waqar and mr siddique had pleaded not guilty to the charge at the same court on april 1 . west midlands police said in a statement two men had been arrested at stechford police station on june 14 . no - one from the jamia mosque was available for comment . sorry we are not currently accepting comments on this article .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 23岁的穆罕默德·瓦卡尔(Mohammad Waqar)和60岁的穆罕默德·西迪克(Mohammad Siddiq)被指控在伯明翰(Birmingham)贾米亚清真寺(Jamia Mosque)的宗教课上多次掌掴男孩，他们已被指控虐待儿童，并将于8月10 日接受审判。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 两名伊斯兰教师因多次殴打一名十岁男孩而将受审，原因是他错误地背诵古兰经。23岁的穆罕默德·瓦卡尔和60岁的穆罕默德·西迪克被指控在英国伊斯兰使命（UKIM）的斯帕克布鲁克清真寺殴打这名男孩。据称，去年5月1日至6月13日期间，在清真寺的宗教课程中，这名男孩被反复扇耳光。法庭听说，这次袭击发生在男孩在学习中犯错，包括没有正确背诵古兰经时。据称，他曾一次遭受黑眼圈。瓦卡尔和西迪克都来自伯明翰的泰斯利，去年6月被西米德兰兹警察局逮捕。他们将于8月10日在伯明翰皇家法院受审，被控虐待16岁以下的人，违反1933年《儿童和青年人法》第1（1）条。虐待16岁以下人的最高刑罚是十年监禁。瓦卡尔和西迪克在4月1日在同一法院对这项指控表示不认罪。西米德兰兹警察局在一份声明中表示，两名男子于6月14日在斯特奇福德警察局被逮捕。清真寺的任何人都无法置评。抱歉，我们目前不接受对本文的评论。

cnndm.src: a judge has sentenced an oregon man to 10 years in prison on monday for fatally stabbing his boyfriend , but the victim 's mother says that 's not long enough . tony lopez lozano , 35 , was charged with the august 2013 murder of his boyfriend , brian romo , after fatally stabbing romo in the heart following an argument at their oregon city home , the oregonian reports . lozano pleaded guilty to first - degree manslaughter as part of a plea deal and , on monday , a judge sentenced him to 10 years in prison -- much to the dismay of the victim 's mother , kathleen tapia . ' you took a deal : 10 years . for me , that 's not long enough , ' tapia said at the sentencing . ' i do n't forgive you , and i never will . ' sentence : a judge has sentenced tony lopez lozano ( photographed ) , of oregon city , to 10 years in prison for fatally stabbing his boyfriend , brian romo . lozano claimed that he was ' very intoxicated ' when he killed romo and , ktvz reports , the fight came after a night of drinking at their home in the city 's south end neighborhood . a prosecutor said that lozano ' has pretty consistently taken responsibility for [ the murder ] . ' however , had the case gone to trial , lozano would have claimed that romo was physically abusive , according to the oregonian . victim : brian romo ( pictured ) , was fatally stabbed in the heart by his boyfriend romo following an argument at their oregon city home . drinking : lozano held that he was ' very intoxicated ' when he killed romo and the fight came after a night of drinking at their home in the city 's south end neighborhood . romo 's relatives said lozano was prone to acts of violence claiming that the 35 - year - old threatened to kill romo and had stabbed him once before . lozano apologized to the victim 's family during the sentencing but told tapia that she was abusive and he was glad he 'd never see her again .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 托尼·洛佩兹·洛扎诺(Toni Lopez Lozano)是一名35岁的俄亥俄州妇女，她于2013年8月在家中争吵时杀死了男友，周一被判处10年监禁。然而，受害人的母亲对判决并不满意，认为十年还不够长。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名法官周一判处一名俄勒冈男子10年监禁，因为他在与男友发生争吵后刺死了男友，但受害者的母亲表示这不够长。据《俄勒冈人报》报道，35岁的托尼·洛佐诺被控于2013年8月在俄勒冈城的家中刺死男友布赖恩·罗莫，罪名为一级过失杀人。洛佐诺在庭审中认罪，并在周一被判处10年监禁，这让受害者的母亲凯瑟琳·塔皮亚感到非常失望。“你接受了交易：10年。对我来说，这不够长，”塔皮亚在判决时说道。“我不会原谅你，永远不会。”洛佐诺声称在杀害罗莫时“非常醉酒”，据KTVZ报道，这场争吵发生在他们位于城市南端社区的家中，当时他们正在喝酒。检察官表示，洛佐诺“一直对（谋杀）负有责任”。然而，如果此案件审判，洛佐诺将声称罗莫有暴力倾向，据《俄勒冈人报》报道。罗莫的亲属表示，洛佐诺有暴力倾向，声称这位35岁的男子曾威胁要杀死罗莫，并曾经刺伤过他一次。洛佐诺在判决时向受害者的家人道歉，但告诉塔皮亚她有暴力倾向，他很高兴再也不会见到她。

cnndm.src: scotland 's bradley neil has received the backing of world no 1 rory mcilroy as he ponders when to turn professional . winning the amateur championship at royal portrush last year secured neil invites to the masters and us open in 2015 , with the walker cup another important date on the calendar . however , the 19 - year - old scot admits he may turn professional before september 's clash with the united states at royal lytham and impressed mcilroy during their practice round together at augusta on monday . rory mcilroy ( left ) accompanies bradley neil ( centre ) during practice ahead of the masters . the world no 1 congratulates the amateur champion after chipping in at the second hole . the scot pens his scorecard as mcilroy practices his putting ahead of his grand slam bid . ' i rate his game really highly , ' said mcilroy , who was on the losing side in the 2007 walker cup . ' he looks ready . he 's very impressive . hits it a long way , does n't seem to be in awe of anything . ' so i just told him to go out there and enjoy it . do n't second guess yourself , commit to your shots , be decisive , all the things i tell myself . mcilroy has tipped the youngster to be a success when he decides to turn professional . ' if he feels ready ( to turn professional ) , then he should go ahead and do it . he 's definitely got the game . even though he grew up playing links golf he hits it quite high and he can flight it ; i can see him one day coming over here and doing well on the pga tour . he has the game for the style of golf to suit playing over here . '
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 苏格兰高尔夫球手布拉德利·尼尔(Bradley Neil)在考虑转为职业球员时得到了世界排名第一的罗里·麦克罗伊(Rory McIlroy)的支持。罗伊对他的比赛给予了高度评价，并认为他有能力在职业比赛中做得更好。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 苏格兰的布拉德利·尼尔得到了世界排名第一的罗里·麦克罗伊的支持，他正在考虑何时转职业。去年在皇家波特拉什赢得业余锦标赛为尼尔赢得了2015年美国大师赛和美国公开赛的邀请，而沃克杯也是他日历上的重要日期。然而，这位19岁的苏格兰人承认他可能会在9月的英国李桑姆杯之前转职业，并在周一在奥古斯塔的练习赛中给麦克罗伊留下了深刻印象。麦克罗伊（左）在大师赛练习赛中陪同布拉德利·尼尔（中），世界排名第一在第二洞击球后祝贺业余冠军。苏格兰人在填写记分卡，麦克罗伊则在练习推杆，准备追求大满贯。麦克罗伊称赞尼尔的球技非常出色，“他看起来已经准备好了。他非常令人印象深刻，击球距离很远，似乎对任何事情都不感到畏惧。”我告诉他要享受比赛，不要犹豫，要果断，这些都是我自己也在做的事情。麦克罗伊预测，当尼尔决定转职业时，他一定会取得成功。“如果他觉得准备好了，就应该去做。他绝对有实力。尽管他从小就打连杆高尔夫，但他击球高度很高，可以控制球的飞行轨迹；我可以看到他将来会来到这里，在美巡赛上取得成功。他的球技非常适合在这里打球。”

cnndm.src: an hiv - positive ohio man accused of sexually assaulting three girls has pleaded not guilty to 19 counts in court , where a prosecutor said one of them , a 12 year old , is pregnant . keith anthony allen , 27 , of columbus pleaded not guilty monday to charges including rape , felonious assault and gross sexual imposition . he remains jailed with no bond , and court records listed no attorney for him . allen is accused of raping two 12 - year - old girls since september and fondling a third girl . remanded : keith anthony allen , 27 , of columbus pleaded not guilty monday to charges including rape , felonious assault and gross sexual imposition . he is accused of raping two 12 - year - old girls and fondling a third girl . the assault charges allege he raped the girls while knowing he was hiv - positive and had consensual sex with a woman without telling her he has the virus that causes aids . prosecutors say allen could face a life sentence if he is convicted of having sex with a child under 13 . the case marks the first time that the franklin county prosecutor ’s office has charged an adult with molesting children while knowing that he carries the virus that causes aids . ' i was outraged when i saw that police report , ' franklin county prosecutor ron o’brien told the columbus dispatch . o’brien said allen had access to the two 12 - year - old girls because his girlfriend is related to one of the children and the other sometimes spent the night with them . the assaults took place between september 1 and march 22 , according to the indictment . allen has been in the franklin county jail since his arrest on march 25 . his bail was set at $ 1 million . o'brien says he is unaware of the health status of the victims in this case , whether or not any of them contracted hiv through allen .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 27岁的俄亥俄州男子基思·安东尼·艾伦(Keith Anthony Allen)被指控性侵三名女孩，其中一名12岁女孩怀孕了。如果艾伦因与儿童发生性关系而被定罪，他将面临终身监禁。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 一名艾滋病毒阳性的俄亥俄州男子被控性侵三名女孩，他在法庭上否认了19项指控。检察官表示其中一名12岁的女孩已怀孕。27岁的基思·安东尼·艾伦被控强奸、重伤和性侵等罪名，目前被拘留在监狱中，没有保释金，也没有律师代表。他被指控自去年9月以来强奸两名12岁的女孩，并对另一名女孩进行猥亵。检察官称，艾伦在知道自己携带艾滋病毒并与一名女性发生性关系时没有告知对方，因此可能面临终身监禁。这是富兰克林县检察官办公室首次起诉一名成年人在知道自己携带艾滋病毒的情况下性侵儿童。检察官罗恩·奥布莱恩告诉哥伦布调度报，他看到警方的报告后感到愤怒。奥布莱恩表示，艾伦可以接触这两名12岁的女孩，是因为他的女朋友与其中一名孩子有亲戚关系，另一名女孩有时也会和他们一起过夜。指控指出，这些性侵事件发生在去年9月1日至今年3月22日之间。艾伦自3月25日被捕后一直被关押在富兰克林县监狱，保释金为100万美元。奥布莱恩表示，他不知道受害者的健康状况，也不知道她们是否通过艾伦感染了艾滋病毒。

cnndm.src: a woman on trial for murder admitted in a recorded interview with police that she had shot two men and fed their bodies to her pigs , the jury heard on tuesday . susan monica , a 66 - year - old pig farmer and welder from southern oregon , went on trial on tuesday in medford . she has been charged with killing two handymen living on her 20 - acre pig ranch in a small jackson county community and dismembering the bodies . accused serial killer susan monica interrupts court in medford , oregon on tuesday on the opening day of her trial for allegedly murdering two men , dismembering their bodies and feeding them to her pigs . susan monica , pictured left in court in january 2014 , and right in an undated mugshot , has been accused of killing robert haney and stephen delicino a year apart at her pig farm and dismembering their bodies . both victims were shot in the head and dismembered in what prosecutors allege were separate murders committed more than a year apart . monica appeared in court dressed in skirt , blouse and short wig . in opening statements , defense lawyer garren pedemonte said monica shot the first victim in self - defense , and the second as a kind of mercy killing . stephen frank delicino , 59 , was shot by monica in self - defense in summer 2012 . the defendant has claimed that she shot the second man , 56 - year - old robert harry haney , to put him out of his misery because she found her pigs already feeding on him , the mail tribune reported . the second killing took place in september 2013 . police searched her pig ranch last year after monica was discovered using a food stamps card belonging to haney , and found remains of the two men . remains of two handymen who had been living on monica 's 20 - acre pig ranch ( pictured ) in jackson county , oregon were found in 2014 after she was caught using one victim 's food stamps card .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 俄勒冈州(Oregon)的苏珊·莫妮卡(Susan Monica)杀死了住在她养猪场的两名勤杂工，并肢解了他们的尸体。 2014年1月，苏珊·莫妮卡出庭，她的辩护律师声称莫妮卡出于自卫杀死了第一名男子，出于同情心杀死了第二名男子。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 周二，陪审团听到一名妇女在警方录音采访中承认她开枪杀死了两名男子，并将他们的尸体喂给了她的猪。66岁的猪农和焊工苏珊·莫妮卡在俄勒冈南部的梅德福德受审，被控杀害住在她20英亩猪场的两名维修工，并肢解尸体。被控连环杀人犯苏珊·莫妮卡在梅德福德的法庭上打断审判，被指控杀害两名男子、肢解尸体并将其喂给猪。辩护律师加伦·佩德蒙特在开场陈述中表示，莫妮卡开枪杀死第一名受害者是为了自卫，第二名受害者则是出于一种怜悯之心。59岁的史蒂芬·弗兰克·德利西诺在2012年夏天被莫妮卡开枪自卫。被告声称，她开枪杀死第二名男子，56岁的罗伯特·哈里·哈尼，是为了让他免于痛苦，因为她发现她的猪已经在吃他。第二起杀人案发生在2013年9月。警方去年在发现莫妮卡使用哈尼的食品券后搜查了她的猪场，并发现了两名男子的遗骸。两名维修工的遗骸在莫妮卡位于俄勒冈杰克逊县的20英亩猪场（如图所示）被发现，此前她被发现使用一名受害者的食品券。

cnndm.src: these are the shocking images of a pet owner 's squalor living conditions in adelaide , where he raised his three cats . in what has been described as a ' confronting case of animal cruelty ' , photos were released by rspca south australia which detailed how the cats at the property were in poor physical condition when they were seized by animal welfare . the resident pleaded guilty to a charge of failing to provide appropriate and adequate living conditions for his cats . these are the shocking images of a pet owner 's squalor living conditions in adelaide , where he raised his three cats . in what has been described as a ' confronting case of animal cruelty ' , these photos were released by rspca south australia on tuesday . the rspca seized the owner 's cats in september and further requested to have them all surrendered in their care , the advertiser reports . however the owner , who 's identity has not been revealed , was granted to have two of his cats returned under the rspca 's supervision . the animal welfare group will be caring and rehoming the third cat . the case was finalised in the christies beach magistrates court , southern adelaide , on tuesday . the owner was further ordered to pay $ 500 in compensation . rspca south australia detailed how the cats at the property were in poor physical condition when they were seized in september . the pet owner pleaded guilty to a charge of failing to provide appropriate and adequate living conditions for his cats . the cats suffered from high - temperatures , flea - allergy dermatitis and significant respiratory issues when they were found at the property , according to the rspca . but this is n't an isolated case as the chief inspector of rspca south australia , andrea lewis , told the advertiser that in the past year they have received more than 1000 similar reports . ' sadly , rspca inspectors and rescue officers are faced with conditions similar to those in this case on a regular basis , ' ms lewis said . ' they work incredibly hard to remove animals from these conditions , and to provide them with the care they deserve . ' ms lewis urged anyone with information about animal cruelty to call 1300 477 722 or report it online .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 9月，RSPCA以“虐待动物”为由扣押了一位宠物主人的猫，并被责令支付500美元的赔偿金。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 这是一篇关于一位宠物主人在阿德莱德肮脏生活环境中养育三只猫的令人震惊的图片。这起被描述为“令人震惊的动物虐待案件”的事件，由南澳大利亚RSPCA发布了照片，详细描述了这位主人的猫在被动物福利机构没收时身体状况极差。这位居民承认未能为他的猫提供适当和充足的生活条件的指控。南澳大利亚RSPCA在周二没收了这位主人的猫，并要求将它们全部交给他们的照顾，据《广告商报》报道。然而，这位主人，身份未知，被允许在RSPCA的监督下将两只猫归还。动物福利组织将照顾和重新安置第三只猫。这起案件在周二在南阿德莱德的克里斯蒂斯海滩地方法院最终结案。这位主人还被命令支付500美元的赔偿金。南澳大利亚RSPCA详细描述了这些猫在被没收时身体状况极差。这位宠物主人承认未能为他的猫提供适当和充足的生活条件的指控。据RSPCA称，这些猫在被发现时患有高温、跳蚤过敏性皮炎和严重的呼吸问题。但这并不是个案，南澳大利亚RSPCA的首席检查官安德烈娅·刘易斯告诉《广告商报》，在过去一年里，他们收到了1000多起类似的报告。刘易斯女士说：“可悲的是，RSPCA的检查员和救援人员经常面对类似这起案件的情况。他们非常努力地将动物从这些环境中解救出来，并为它们提供应有的关怀。”她敦促任何有关动物虐待的信息都可以拨打1300 477 722或在网上举报。

cnndm.src: a coast guard cutter arrived in san diego on thursday with more than 14 tons of cocaine , part of what authorities has described as a surge of seizures near central and south america . the cocaine , valued by the coast guard at $ 424 million , was seized by u.s. and canadian forces in 19 separate incidents in the eastern pacific ocean near central and south america . it included a 10 1/2 - ton bust from a coastal freighter , the largest maritime drug interdiction in that area since 2009 . a crewman from the coast guard cutter boutwell guards some of more than 28,000 pounds of cocaine , seized at sea and offloaded at naval base san diego on thursday . the cocaine was seized by u.s. and canadian forces in 19 separate incidents in the eastern pacific ocean near central and south america . the u.s. navy and coast guard and royal canadian navy ships have seized more than 28 tons of cocaine valued at $ 848 million in the eastern pacific region near central and south america in the last six months , resulting in 101 arrests . that 's more than the 12 - month period that ended in september , and u.s. authorities have called it the most successful run for drug seizures in the area since 2009 . suspicious vessels in international waters were tracked by military or law enforcement aircraft or vessels . coast guard personnel operating from coast guard cutters and royal canadian navy vessels boarded the ships to seize the drugs . thursday 's arrival marked the second time that the cutter boutwell has returned home with a huge load of drugs . in october , its crew turned over more than 14 tons of cocaine to the u.s. drug enforcement administration . suspicious vessels in international waters were tracked by military or law enforcement aircraft or vessels . coast guard personnel operating from coast guard cutters and royal canadian navy vessels boarded the ships to seize the drugs . thursday 's arrival marked the second time that the cutter boutwell returned home with a huge load of drugs . in october , its crew turned over more than 14 tons of cocaine to the u.s. drug enforcement administration . u.s. navy and coast guard and royal canadian navy ships have seized more than 28 tons of cocaine valued at $ 848 million in the last six months .
cnndm.element-aware_summary: 过去六个月，美国海军、海岸警卫队和加拿大皇家海军的船只缉获了超过28吨可卡因，价值8.48亿美元。这是自2009年以来该地区最大的一次海上缉毒行动。
cnndm.gpt3_cot_summary: 周四，一艘海岸警卫队巡逻船抵达圣地亚哥，携带着超过14吨可卡因，这是当局称为中南美洲附近缉获数量激增的一部分。这批价值4.24亿美元的可卡因是由美国和加拿大部队在东太平洋19起事件中缴获的，其中包括一次从一艘沿海货船上缴获的10.5吨可卡因，这是自2009年以来该地区最大的海上毒品截获行动。一名海岸警卫队巡逻船的船员在周四护送超过28,000磅的可卡因，这些毒品是在东太平洋中南美洲附近19起事件中由美国和加拿大部队缴获的。在过去六个月里，美国海军、海岸警卫队和加拿大皇家海军舰艇在东太平洋地区中南美洲附近缴获了价值8.48亿美元的超过28吨可卡因，导致101人被逮捕。这比截至9月份的12个月期间更多，美国当局称这是自2009年以来该地区毒品截获最成功的一次。可疑船只在国际水域被军事或执法飞机或船只跟踪。海岸警卫队人员从海岸警卫队巡逻船和加拿大皇家海军舰艇上操作登上船只缴获毒品。周四的抵达标志着巡逻船“博特威尔”第二次携带大量毒品回国。去年10月，它的船员曾将超过14吨可卡因交给美国缉毒局。可疑船只在国际水域被军事或执法飞机或船只跟踪。海岸警卫队人员从海岸警卫队巡逻船和加拿大皇家海军舰艇上操作登上船只缴获毒品。周四的抵达标志着巡逻船“博特威尔”第二次携带大量毒品回国。去年10月，它的船员曾将超过14吨可卡因交给美国缉毒局。在过去六个月里，美国海军、海岸警卫队和加拿大皇家海军舰艇共缴获了价值8.48亿美元的超过28吨可卡因。

cnndm.src: a radical muslim preacher has been refused a passport after the home office accused him of planning to join islamic state . trevor brooks , an associate of islamist firebrand anjem choudary , was told it was not in the public interest for him to have a passport because he is seen as a terror risk . a home office letter says that brooks , also known as abu izzadeen , is an extremist linked to members of the banned group al muhajiroun . trevor brooks is a known associate of islamist firebrand preacher anjem choudary ( pictured ) the letter adds : ' it is also assessed that you intend to travel overseas to syria where you would use this opportunity to engage in terrorism - related activity , likely fighting alongside the terrorist organisation known as the islamic state .
